div.p: View the Continuity of Education Plan
Veronica Joyner has been an educator for 40 years. She started The Mathematics, Civics and Sciences Charter School of Philadelphia in 1999 with one mission

You are Invited to attend our
Annual Move Up Day Ceremony

Community College of Philadelphia – Bonnell Building
(17th St. between Spring Garden & Callowhill St.)
Come Celebrate with your child and witness some of what your child learned this year.

div.p: Thank you for the warm welcome and tour of the Mathematics, Civics and Sciences Charter School of Philadelphia. I enjoyed learning more about your school’s outstanding academic program and the tremendous strides that your students are making. I am pleased to know that you share my commitment to providing world-class learning opportunities to all children.

Thank you for your gracious welcome and tour of The Mathematics, Civics and Sciences Charter School of Philadelphia Inc., in June 2008. My visit with you was a quality introduction to the Philadelphia approach and an informative opportunity to observe an academic model of instruction that is faithful to its mission. I wholly agree that all children can learn If! high levels.
